data.title: Members of the College
data.meta_description: Benoit CEREXHE – Mayor Functions : Police – Security (Emergency planning) – Prevention – Registry office – Population – Municipal staff – Coordination of the politics – Public relations and information – Protocol – Sports – Animations […]
data.text:
Benoit CEREXHE – Mayor

Functions : Police – Security (Emergency planning) – Prevention – Registry office – Population – Municipal staff – Coordination of the politics – Public relations and information – Protocol – Sports – Animations – Cults – Legal affairs – Public works and spaces

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

02/773.05.34/35 : Secretariat

02/773.06.15 : Cabinet chief

02/773.05.38 – 0494/50.11.15 : Press officer

bcerexhe@woluwe1150.be

https://www.facebook.com/benoit.cerexhe

Caroline LHOIR – Deputy Mayor

Functions : Green transition – sustainable development – Agenda 21 – Environment – Public Cleanliness – Waste – Green spaces and biodiversity – Animal well being – Nurseries (F) – Early Childhood

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

Private : Rue Jean Deraeck 39 – 1150 Bruxelles

Phone (office) : 02 /773.05.05

clhoir@woluwe1150.be

www.facebook.com/CarolineLhoirWSP

Antoine BERTRAND – Deputy Mayor

Functions : Energy transition – Municipal buildings – Municipal properties – Youth – Economic life (shops, middle classes and self-employed)

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

Private : Avenue du Haras 148 – 1150 Bruxelles

Phone (office) : 02 /773.07.73.

antoine.bertrand@woluwe1150.be

https://www.facebook.com/BertrandAnt

https://twitter.com/AntBertrand

Carine KOLCHORY – Deputy Mayor

Functions : Family – Senior people – Social affairs – Health – People with disabilities – Pension – Equality – Housing (including the social real estate agency)

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

Private : avenue des Dames Blanches 24 – 1150 Bruxelles

Office : 02/773.05.08

ckolchory@woluwe1150.be

https://www.facebook.com/carine.kolchory

twitter.com/CarineKolchory

Dominique HARMEL – Deputy Mayor

Functions : Finances – Budget – Supervision of the Public Center for Social Action

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

Private : Avenue Yvan Lutens 24 – 1150 Bruxelles

Office : 02 /773.05.01

dharmel@woluwe1150.be

Helmut DE VOS – Deputy Mayor

Functions: Dutch Speaking Education, Academies, Culture, libraries and nurseries, Brede School

Office : Av. Ch. Thielemans 93 – 1150 Bruxelles

Permanence : Thursday from 4PM to 6PM or by appointment

Phone (office) : 02 /773.05.04

hdevos@woluwe1150.be
